oracle.pg.text.solr

Class SolrIndexUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.pg.text.OracleIndexUtils
      • oracle.pg.text.solr.SolrIndexUtils

  • public class SolrIndexUtils
extends OracleIndexUtils
    This class contains a set of utilities to handle text search and text indexes over SolrCloud

    • Method Detail

      • appendDTToKey

        public static java.lang.String appendDTToKey(java.lang.String key,
                                             java.lang.Class dtClass)
        Appends the value's data type SUFFIX to the specified key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key.
        dtClass - the value's data type
        Returns:
        a new key with a data type Suffix.

      • commitCloudServer

        public static void commitCloudServer(org.apache.solr.client.solrj.impl.CloudSolrServer cloudSolrServer,
                                     long timeout)
        Commit the specified CloudSolrServer object
        Parameters:
        cloudSolrServer - a CloudSolrServer object
        timeout - the timeout in (ms) to retry the operation if it was not successful

      • getCloudSolrServer

        public static org.apache.solr.client.solrj.impl.CloudSolrServer getCloudSolrServer(java.lang.String solrServerUrl,
                                                                                   java.lang.String directoryName,
                                                                                   int zkTimeout,
                                                                                   long writeTimeout)
        Gets a new CloudSolrServer object to handle operations over the index.
        Parameters:
        solrServerUrl - the SolrCloud server URL used to connect to the SolrCloud service. E.g., http://localhost:2181/solr
        directoryName - the name of the directory
        zkTimeout - a positive integer representing the timeout (in seconds) used to wait for a Zookeeper connection.
        writeTimeout - the timeout (in ms) that is allowed to wait for a index write operation.
        Returns:
        a new instance of CloudSolrServer

      • getDatatypePrefix

        public static java.lang.String getDatatypePrefix(java.lang.Class dtClass)
        Gets the data type prefix for the given data type class. The data type prefix is used when composing the field name of a SolrDocument representing a K/V pair.
        Returns:
        the data type prefix for the associated object

      • quietlyCloseCloudSolrServer

        public static void quietlyCloseCloudSolrServer(org.apache.solr.client.solrj.impl.CloudSolrServer cloudSolrServer)
        Closes the specified CloudSolrServer object
        Parameters:
        cloudSolrServer - a CloudSolrServer object
